mapper.insert: insert into others_files (name, time, rank, peopleNumber, useScope, note, year, semester, status, classTeacher) values (#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{rank,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{peopleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useScope,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{semester,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update others_files set name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, time = #{time,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, rank = #{rank,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, peopleNumber = #{peopleNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, useScope = #{useScope,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, semester = #{semester,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, classTeacher = #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, time, rank, peopleNumber, useScope, note, year, semester, status, classTeacher from others_files where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
